## Description

Documentacion levantamiento docker

## Project setup

```bash
$ crear archico Dockerfile
```

## Compile and run the project
poner esteos comandos 

```bash
FROM node:#version del node que neccesite

WORKDIR /app

COPY package.json .

RUN npm install

COPY . .

RUN npm run build

EXPOSE 8080

CMD [ "npm", "run", "start" ]
```

## Run tests
Ejecutar este comando 
```bash
docker build -t app-agriculture:v1 .
docker images
docker run -p 5000:8080 app-agriculture:v2
```

## Subir Imagen google cloud
inciar la consola cmd
```bash
gcloud init
```
iniciamos la intacia que tenemos configurado desde cloud
```bash
docker tag app-agriculture:v3 gcr.io/qualified-smile-445322-g8/app-agriculture:v3
gcloud auth configure-docker 
docker push gcr.io/qualified-smile-445322-g8/app-agriculture:v3
```
